plot: Incident at Mars Bluff explores the accidental release of a 7600 pound atomic bomb on an unsuspecting South Carolina community in 1958.
title: Carolina Stories: Incident at Mars Bluff
plot_es: Incident at Mars Bluff explores the accidental release of a 7600 pound atomic bomb on an unsuspecting South Carolina community in 1958.
original_name: Carolina Stories: Incident at Mars Bluff
plot_en: Incident at Mars Bluff explores the accidental release of a 7600 pound atomic bomb on an unsuspecting South Carolina community in 1958.
